summary: A model tells a television crew about her dreams of a life with Prince Charming while she is fending off the lecherous advances of a horde of men.
cast: Dorothy McGowan|Jean Rochefort|Sami Frey|Grayson Hall|Philippe Noiret|Alice Sapritch|Fernando Arrabal|Guy d'Avout|Roger Constant|Francis Dumoulin|Luce Fabiole|Isabelle Garçon|Violette Leduc|Michèle Loubet|Marie Marc|Ivan Nabokoff|Pierre Pernet|Jacques Rispal|Alain Roche|Pierre Baillot|Michel Robin|Joanna Shimkus|Jacques Seiler|Roland Topor|Roger Trapp|Paul Bonifas|René Clermont|Gérard Darrieu|Claude Mansard|Bernard Musson|Gaëtan Noël|Odette Piquet|Nicolas Youmatoff|Delphine Seyrig|George Delamarre|Geneviève Tabouis|Jean Nocher|Donyale Luna|Peggy Moffitt|Richard Avedon|Louis Faurer|Jeanloup Sieff|Marcha Grant|Anatole Dauman|Jean-Michel Folon|Marcel Gassouk|Sylvain Levignac|Jacques Martin|Claude Melki|Elizabeth Teissier
title: ¿Quién eres tú, Polly Maggoo?
